appliedGuidelines.reason: Incorporated priorities order and security emphasis consistent with project guidelines
Java version guideline updated to Java 16 as per project guidelines
Access modifiers updated to 'public by default, minimize private' to conform with project guidelines
Design patterns guideline updated to 'Aggressively apply patterns' matching project guidelines
Encapsulation guideline updated to 'Keep implementation details public, we hate helper methods' as per project guidelines
Spring Boot version noted as 2.8 with Java 16 in project guidelines; referenced in framework extensions
Configuration preference for properties over YAML and externalized configuration noted in project guidelines
Repository pattern guideline updated to prefer repositories using SQL prepared statements, not Spring Data JPA
